itunes:subtitle: Breaking Benjamin guitarists Jasen Rauch and Keith Wallen join the show to talk about touring with Alice In Chains (who they grew up loving), the best metal albums of all time, what non-metal music inspired them growing up, and how their music succeeds i...
itunes:summary:
Breaking Benjamin guitarists Jasen Rauch and Keith Wallen join the show to talk about touring with Alice In Chains (who they grew up loving), the best metal albums of all time, what non-metal music inspired them growing up, and how their music succeeds in the industry as compared to other genres of music.
